content.question: A battery of <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="open script E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi></math> and internal resistance <math alttext="lowercase r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> is connected in series to two resistors, each of resistance <math alttext="uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>. Which expression is equal to the potential difference across the battery?

choices.label: <math alttext="open script E times, open parenthesis, 1 minus the complex fraction with numerator lowercase r, and denominator the fraction uppercase R over 2, end fraction, plus lowercase r, end complex fraction, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mrow><mfrac><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open script E times, open parenthesis, 1 minus the fraction with numerator lowercase r, and denominator uppercase R plus lowercase r, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mrow><mi>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open script E times, open parenthesis, 1 minus the fraction with numerator lowercase r, and denominator 2 uppercase R plus lowercase r, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open script E times, open parenthesis, 1 minus the fraction lowercase r over 2 uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open script E times, open parenthesis, 1 minus the fraction with numerator lowercase r, and denominator 2 uppercase R plus lowercase r, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
